author: Perry Moerland
title: A Comparison of Mixture Models for Density Estimation
window: The raw data has been pre-processed in various ways. First of all, the ordinal inputs have been normalized to have zero mean and unit standard deviation on the training data. For the soybean data set part of the inputs are categorical and these are mapped to a 1-of-c coding, thus increasing the number of attributes (see the fifth column of Table 1).
